name: English US / random.json
description: Localization strings for random image commands (cat, dog, capybara, meme).
author: ScarlxtPink

data.plural.error.missing_permissions:
I do not have one of the following permissions:
- {missing}
data.plural.error.system_disabled:
Plural system is disabled in this server.
If you are an admin, use `/plural enable` to enable it.
data.plural.edit.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch message with ID {message_id}: {error}
data.plural.edit.only_edit_self: I can only edit messages sent by myself.
data.plural.edit.not_plural_message: The specified message was not sent as a plural member.
data.plural.edit.webhook_failure: Failed to get or create webhook for editing message.
data.plural.edit.webhook_failed: Failed to edit message via webhook
data.plural.error.server_only: This command can only be used in a server.
data.plural.error.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command. (Must have `Administrator`)
data.plural.system.already_enabled: Plural system is already enabled in this server.
data.plural.error.note_missing_perms:
Note: I do not have one of the following permissions in this channel:
- {missing}
data.plural.system.enabled: Plural system enabled in this server.
data.plural.system.already_disabled: Plural system is already disabled in this server.
data.plural.system.disabled: Plural system disabled in this server.
data.plural.create.name_length: Member name must be between 2 and 52 characters.
data.plural.create.exists:
A member with the name `{member}` already exists.
You can see them with `/plural member edit {member}`
data.plural.list.no_members: You do not have any members
data.plural.list.title: Plural Members
data.plural.switch.no_members: You have no plural members. Use `/plural member create` to create one.
data.plural.switch.switched_out:
Switched out (No Member).
To use `/p` again you need to switch to a member.
data.plural.switch.success:
Switched to member `{member}`.
Use `/p` to send a message as this member.
data.plural.avatar.no_avatar: Member `{member}` does not have an avatar set.
data.plural.avatar.title: Avatar for member `{member}`
data.plural.logs.title: Plural Configuration Logs
data.plural.member_view.modal.prefix.label: Set the prefix for this member:
data.plural.member_view.modal.suffix.label: Set the suffix for this member:
data.plural.member_view.modal.item.title: Create New Plural Member
data.plural.member_view.modal.item.label: Enter the {type} for the new member:
data.plural.member_view.embed.title: New Plural Member Creation
data.plural.member_view.embed.author: Name: {member}
data.plural.member_view.created:
Member `{member}` saved successfully.
Use `/plural member switch {member}` or `/switch {member}` to switch to this member.
Use `/plural member edit {member}` to edit this member.
